fields.description: Sql always encrypted properties.
fields.name: AlwaysEncryptedSettings

fields.description: The application workload type when connecting to a server, used by recommended version. Possible values are ReadOnly and ReadWrite. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: ApplicationIntent

fields.description: The type used for authentication. Type: string.
fields.name: AuthenticationType

fields.description: Indicates the azure cloud type of the service principle auth. Allowed values are AzurePublic, AzureChina, AzureUsGovernment, AzureGermany. Default value is the data factory regionsâ€™ cloud type. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: AzureCloudType

fields.description: The default wait time (in seconds) before terminating the attempt to execute a command and generating an error, used by recommended version. Type: integer (or Expression with resultType integer).
fields.name: CommandTimeout

fields.description: The number of re-connections attempted after identifying that there was an idle connection failure, used by recommended version. This must be an integer between 0 and 255. Type: integer (or Expression with resultType integer).
fields.name: ConnectRetryCount

fields.description: The amount of time (in seconds) between each re-connection attempt after identifying that there was an idle connection failure, used by recommended version. This must be an integer between 1 and 60. Type: integer (or Expression with resultType integer).
fields.name: ConnectRetryInterval

fields.description: The length of time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to the server before terminating the attempt and generating an error, used by recommended version. Type: integer (or Expression with resultType integer).
fields.name: ConnectTimeout

fields.description: The connection string. Type: string, SecureString or AzureKeyVaultSecretReference.
fields.name: ConnectionString

fields.description: The name of the database, used by recommended version. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: Database

fields.description: Indicate whether TLS encryption is required for all data sent between the client and server, used by recommended version. Possible values are true/yes/mandatory, false/no/optional and strict. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: Encrypt

fields.description: The encrypted credential used for authentication. Credentials are encrypted using the integration runtime credential manager. Type: string.
fields.name: EncryptedCredential

fields.description: The name or address of the partner server to connect to if the primary server is down, used by recommended version. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: FailoverPartner

fields.description: The host name to use when validating the server certificate for the connection. When not specified, the server name from the Data Source is used for certificate validation, used by recommended version. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: HostNameInCertificate

fields.description: Indicate whether User ID and Password are specified in the connection (when false) or whether the current Windows account credentials are used for authentication (when true), used by recommended version. Type: Boolean (or Expression with resultType boolean).
fields.name: IntegratedSecurity

fields.description: The minimum time, in seconds, for the connection to live in the connection pool before being destroyed, used by recommended version. Type: integer (or Expression with resultType integer).
fields.name: LoadBalanceTimeout

fields.description: The maximum number of connections allowed in the connection pool for this specific connection string, used by recommended version. Type: integer (or Expression with resultType integer).
fields.name: MaxPoolSize

fields.description: The minimum number of connections allowed in the connection pool for this specific connection string, used by recommended version. Type: integer (or Expression with resultType integer).
fields.name: MinPoolSize

fields.description: If your application is connecting to an AlwaysOn availability group (AG) on different subnets, setting MultiSubnetFailover=true provides faster detection of and connection to the (currently) active server, used by recommended version. Type: Boolean (or Expression with resultType boolean).
fields.name: MultiSubnetFailover

fields.description: When true, an application can maintain multiple active result sets (MARS). When false, an application must process or cancel all result sets from one batch before it can execute any other batch on that connection, used by recommended version. Type: Boolean (or Expression with resultType boolean).
fields.name: MultipleActiveResultSets

fields.description: The size in bytes of the network packets used to communicate with an instance of server, used by recommended version. Type: integer (or Expression with resultType integer).
fields.name: PacketSize

fields.description: Indicate whether the connection will be pooled or explicitly opened every time that the connection is requested, used by recommended version. Type: Boolean (or Expression with resultType boolean).
fields.name: Pooling

fields.description: The name or network address of the instance of SQL Server to which to connect, used by recommended version. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: Server

fields.description: The service principal credential type to use in Server-To-Server authentication. 'ServicePrincipalKey' for key/secret, 'ServicePrincipalCert' for certificate. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: ServicePrincipalCredentialType

fields.description: The ID of the service principal used to authenticate against Azure SQL Database. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: ServicePrincipalId

fields.description: The name or ID of the tenant to which the service principal belongs. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: Tenant

fields.description: Indicate whether the channel will be encrypted while bypassing walking the certificate chain to validate trust, used by recommended version. Type: Boolean (or Expression with resultType boolean).
fields.name: TrustServerCertificate

fields.description: The user name to be used when connecting to server. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: UserName
